note.p: Education: Pupil of William Oughtred; MA (Oxford 1642); Incorporated at Cambridge (1671)
References: Jessie M Sweet, 'Sir Hans Sloane's Metalline Cubes' in NR 1953 vol 10 pp 99-100
G H Turnbull, 'Samuel Hartlib's Influence on the Early History of the Royal Society' in NR 1953 vol 10 pp 101-130
Notes: Taylor 'Math Practitioners' gives year of death as 1685.
